name: Untitled Ghost Game (Lilinyx)
description:
Team Ficus presents Untitled Ghost Game! A prototype about a cute ghost possessing body parts to solve puzzles and escape a laboratory.

Controls

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

W - Look Up (Possession Mode)/Fly Up (Ghost Mode)

S - Look Down (Possesion Mode)/Fly Down (Ghost Mode)

Space - Jump (Possesion Mode)

E - Interact/Possess Body Part

Q - Drop All Body Parts

Esc - Pause Menu
